name: ToMars
description:
We are not alone on Mars! The game has advanced object physics, ragdolls, various weapons and levels. This is my first game hosted on the web in 2014. It is the first part of the ToMars series. The game comes with a level editor. A sequel to the game with new levels, new weapons, improved gameplay, 3D sound, and more see here: https://axel-k.itch.io/tomars-secrets-of-phobos

Control:

W,D - move

A - jump

S - duck

LMB - shooting

RMB - pick up an object / aim (allows you to look further)

R - reload

K - Use healthkit (works automatically)

1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9 or mouse wheel - weapon selection

F1 - info

ESC - pause
